name: Aurora Sinistra
personality: Sinistra was a serious and strict woman. She feared the Dark Lord Voldemort and her Boggart assumed his form.[4]She was also proven to have been a highly competent teacher, as her lessons inspected by Dolores Umbridge were deemed satisfactory enough that she was not subject to displinary action by her. Her competency as a teacher was also proven by how she taught her subject for at least ten years at Hogwarts, showing her to be highly experienced and skilled in her field.
quote: Professor Grubbly-Plank was chatting to Professor Sinistra, the Astronomy teacher...
—Sinistra talking with her fellow staff members
Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
description: Professor Aurora Sinistra was a British witch who taught in the Astronomy department at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Professor Sinistra was teaching by September 1985. The subject included studying the night sky with telescopes.[6]
